com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.conditions

Class ObserverManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.conditions.ObserverManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverManager, com.kuka.threading.IDisposable

    public class ObserverManagerImpl
extends Object
implements com.kuka.threading.IDisposable, ObserverManager
    Class to create and handle condition observers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObserverManagerImpl(IConditionService conditionService)
      Creates a new instance of ObserverManagerImpl.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConditionObserver createAndEnableConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IAnyEdgeListener anyEdgeListener)
      Create a new condition observer and start observing any edge of a condition, i.e. the observer is immediately enabled and events are sent for each change of the condition between true and false according to the notification type.
      ConditionObserver createAndEnableConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IFallingEdgeListener fallingEdgeListener)
      Create a new condition observer and start observing the falling edge of a condition, i.e. the observer is immediately enabled and events are sent for each change of the condition from true to false according to the notification type.
      ConditionObserver createAndEnableConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IRisingEdgeListener risingEdgeListener)
      Create a new condition observer and start observing rising edge of a condition, i.e. the observer is immediately enabled and events are sent for each change of the condition from false to true according to the notification type.
      ConditionObserver createConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IAnyEdgeListener anyEdgeListener)
      Creates a new condition observer to observe any edge of a condition.
      ConditionObserver createConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IFallingEdgeListener fallingEdgeListener)
      Creates a new condition observer to observe the falling edge of a condition.
      ConditionObserver createConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, NotificationType notificationType, IRisingEdgeListener risingEdgeListener)
      Creates a new condition observer to observe the rising edge of a condition.

      boolean evaluate(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition)
      Evaluates a condition.
      List<ConditionObserver> getRegisteredConditionObservers()
      Get a list of all registered condition observers.

      Remove the selected condition observer.

      Blocks the calling thread until the condition is true.
      boolean waitFor(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition, long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Blocks the calling thread until the condition is true or the timeout has elapsed.

      • createConditionObserver

        public ConditionObserver createConditionObserver(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition,
                                                 NotificationType notificationType,
                                                 IRisingEdgeListener risingEdgeListener)
        Description copied from interface: ObserverManager
        Creates a new condition observer to observe the rising edge of a condition.

        Note: To start observing, the ConditionObserver has to be enabled.

        Specified by:
        createConditionObserver in interface ObserverManager
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to observe.
        notificationType - Notification options of the ConditionObserver
        risingEdgeListener - The listener for observing the rising edge of the condition.
        Returns:
        a new condition observer to observe the rising edge of a condition

      • removeConditionObserver

        public void removeConditionObserver(ConditionObserver conditionObserver)
        Description copied from interface: ObserverManager
        Remove the selected condition observer. As soon as the condition is removed, it can not be enabled any more. Observers should be removed when the application does not need them any more. Observers are automatically removed when the application exits.
        Specified by:
        removeConditionObserver in interface ObserverManager
        Parameters:
        conditionObserver - The condition observer to remove.

      • getRegisteredConditionObservers

        public List<ConditionObserver> getRegisteredConditionObservers()
        Description copied from interface: ObserverManager
        Get a list of all registered condition observers.
        Specified by:
        getRegisteredConditionObservers in interface ObserverManager
        Returns:
        List of all registered conditionObservers.

      • waitFor

        public boolean waitFor(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition,
                       long timeout,
                       TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Description copied from interface: ObserverManager
        Blocks the calling thread until the condition is true or the timeout has elapsed. If the condition is already true when called, this method returns immediately.
        Specified by:
        waitFor in interface ObserverManager
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to wait for.
        timeout - The maximum time the calling thread is blocked. A negative value means that no timeout will be used. In this case, the method ObserverManager.waitFor(ICondition) may also be used.
        The execution of this method takes some milliseconds independently from the given timeout.
        timeUnit - The unit of the timeout.
        Returns:
        true, if the condition fires during the configured timeout, false otherwise.
        Even if the timeout is smaller than the execution time of this method, the condition state at the time of the method call will be returned.

      • waitFor

        public void waitFor(com.kuka.condition.ICondition condition)
        Description copied from interface: ObserverManager
        Blocks the calling thread until the condition is true. If the condition is already true when called, this method returns immediately.
        Specified by:
        waitFor in interface ObserverManager
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to wait for.
